column1: Hide Prev/Next Controls when Not Hovering (will always show on touch devices)
column2: Hide Prev/Next Controls when Not Hovering (will always show on touch devices)

column1: Scroll one page at a time (as opposed to per product)
column2: Scroll one page at a time (as opposed to per product)

column1: Products to Show at a Time (default)
column2: Products to Show at a Time (default)

column1: Products to Show at a Time (on Large/Small-Desktop Screens)
column2: Products to Show at a Time (on Large/Small-Desktop Screens)

column1: Products to Show at a Time (on Medium/Tablet Screens)
column2: Products to Show at a Time (on Medium/Tablet Screens)

column1: Products to Show at a Time (on Small/Mobile Screens)
column2: Products to Show at a Time (on Small/Mobile Screens)

column1: Include Prev/Next Controls (always included when Auto-scroll is No and Include Pager is No)
column2: Include Prev/Next Controls (always included when Auto-scroll is No and Include Pager is No)
